verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David when he feigned madness before Abimelech, who drove him) (away and he departed.) I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> His <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall <S%H8548>continually<s%> be in my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1984>make<s%> its <S%H1984>boast<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> The <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> it and <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
O <S%H1431>magnify<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with me, And let us <S%H7311>exalt<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>
I <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, And <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4034>fears.<s%>
They <S%H5027>looked<s%> to Him and were <S%H9315>radiant,<s%> And their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall <S%H408>never<s%> be <S%H2659>ashamed.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H6041>man<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> him, And <S%H3467>saved<s%> him out of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2583>encamps<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him, And <S%H2502>rescues<s%> them.
O <S%H2938>taste<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> who <S%H2620>takes<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him!
O <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you His <S%H6918>saints;<s%> For to those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him, <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>want.<s%>

The <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions<s%> do <S%H7326>lack<s%> and <S%H7456>suffer<s%> <S%H7456>hunger;<s%> But they who <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall not be in <S%H2637>want<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H9185>thing.<s%>
<S%H1980>Come,<s%> you <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me; I will <S%H3925>teach<s%> you the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H2655>desires<s%> <S%H9132>life,<s%> And <S%H157>loves<s%> [length of] <S%H3117>days<s%> that he may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%>?
<S%H5341>Keep<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> from <S%H9563>evil,<s%> And your <S%H8193>lips<s%> from <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H9563>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H9185>good;<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursue<s%> it.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> And His <S%H241>ears<s%> are [open] to their <S%H7775>cry.<s%>
The <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is against <S%H6213>evildoers,<s%> <S%H7451><s%> To <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
[The righteous] <S%H6817>cry<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>hears,<s%> And <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to the <S%H7665>brokenhearted,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> And <S%H3467>saves<s%> those <S%H1793>who<s%> are <S%H1793>crushed<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are the <S%H9567>afflictions<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> him out of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
He <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6106>bones;<s%> Not <S%H259>one<s%> of them is <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
<S%H9567>Evil<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> And those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H816>condemned.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6299>redeems<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of His <S%H5650>servants;<s%> And <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of those who <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him will be <S%H816>condemned.<s%>
